text: Bernard Verley (born 4 October 1939) is a French actor and producer.http://www.artmedia.fr/fiche.cfm/180884-bernard_verley.html ==Biography== Former student of les Beaux-Arts in Lille, he then joined the TNP Jean Vilar. His brother Renaud Verley is also an actor. In the mid-1970s, he devoted himself to film production.
